description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Queen's Scarlet; being the Adventures and Misadventures of Sir Richard Frayne. [A tale] ... With ... illustrations by A. M. Smith" Author: FENN, George Manville. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012629.g.20." Page: 279 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1895 Publisher: Cassell and Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001215760 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
